name: Harrison Ford Movies Test |   People Themed

questions.text: In "Witness", Harrison Ford investigates a murder that is witnessed by an Amish boy. Where did the murder occur?
questions.explanation:
Public  Restroom.

	Danny Glover as the heavy. Good movie.

questions.text: Ford plays the President of the U.S. in "Air Force 1". Who plays the Vice President?
questions.explanation:
Glenn Close.

	Macy was also in the cast. Good action film.

questions.text: In "K 19", Ford and Liam Neeson are involved in a submarine crisis. When does the action in the story take place?
options: Between WW I and WW II
questions.explanation:
Cold War after WW II.

	Set in 1961 (prior to the Cuban Missile Crisis).

questions.text: In "American Graffiti", Ford's character enters into a car race with a character played by what actor?
questions.explanation:
Paul Le Mat.

	Le Mat did a fine job - but, unlike many other members of the cast, his career didn't take off.

questions.text: Ford starred in "Clear and Present Danger". Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Tom Clancy.

	Also the author of "Patriot Games".

questions.text: Who played Ford's wife in "Patriot Games"?
What role did Ford's character play in "Presumed Innocent"?
questions.explanation:
Prosecutor.

	Aside from ending up as the accused/defendant, Ford's character was a public prosecutor. From the Scott Turow novel.

questions.text: Who played Ford's wife in "What Lies Beneath"?
questions.explanation:
Michelle Pfeiffer.

	Ford in a thriller for a change.

questions.text: In "The Fugitive", Ford retains the name of the TV character (Richard Kimble). What about the name of the policeman pursuing him?
questions.correct: Same last name, different first name
options: Different first name, different last name
Same first name, different last name
Same first name, same last name
questions.explanation:
Same last name, different first name.

	The Barry Morsee character of Philip Gerard is changed to the Tommy Lee Jones character of Sam Gerard.
